name: technocracy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
politics
  specialized a government or social system that is controlled or influenced by experts in science or technology; the fact of a government or social system being influenced by such experts : We live in a technocracy where progress involves the mastering of increasingly complex data. In her opinion, technocracy was not incompatible with democracy.
